author: jstrachan
msg: * added an Ant task to autogenerate the HTML documentation, the XSD and the META-INF/services properties file. The XSD needs a bit more work but its not too far away
* added support for JMX ObjectName as a native property type

author: chirino
msg: - Added bean ref support.  Just add "-ref" to the end of attribute name to turn the value into a bean ref.

author: dblevins
msg: Added the ability to specify properties via inlined properties file

author: jstrachan
msg: fixed maven build for pre-Java 5 platforms

author: jstrachan
msg: added test case to demonstrate setting a URI property
